name: Doc Char Text Fail Empty Nest Union Line FlatAlt Cat Column WithPageWidth Nesting Annotated

  • = SFail
  • | SEmpty
  • | SChar !Char (SimpleDocStream ann)
  • | SText !Int !Text (SimpleDocStream ann)
  • | SLine !Int (SimpleDocStream ann)
  • | SAnnPush ann (SimpleDocStream ann)
  • | SAnnPop (SimpleDocStream ann)
name: SimpleDocStream SChar SFail SEmpty SText SLine SAnnPop SAnnPush

data Doc ann

  • | Nest !Int (Doc ann)
